incidents.name: [WAW1][Bare Metal Cloud] - Rack W17A15 incident notification
incidents.message: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : We are doing some cooling system replacement in the rack W17A15. Impacted Service : All servers will be unavailable. Please be aware that this may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 45D14
incidents.message: An incident is in progress on our Dedicated Servers in RBX3, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details: Start time : 17/02/2024 13:04 UTC Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack 45D14 are no longer responding. Root cause : Cooling module malfunction Ongoing actions : Our teams are actively working to resolve the incident and restore services as quickly as possible We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
